share: Cupcake by Robbie Seahag Mangano

By Anthony Garone

A weird music duet between Robbie Seahag Mangano and Anthony Garone.

Find Robbie Seahag on:

Like what you see here?

Please support our efforts! We are taking orders for shirts and accepting donations of code, content creation and translation, art, social media help, and money.

Follow Make Weird Music on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram.

Background

Robbie Seahag Mangano and I got together in early March to film a bunch of stuff. We laughed for hours making a video that has yet to see the light of day. This performance of “Cupcake” was filmed at the end of a long, fun day of recording together.

You should buy Robbie’s new album, Bumbleweenie.

You should also check out these videos we’ve made together: Weasel Shake and 33 in Buffalo.
